sentences.sentence: There is not a scintilla of truth in what she says.
He says there is "not a scintilla of evidence" to link him to any controversy.
sentences.translation: 他说“没有丝毫证据”能将他与任何争议联系起来。

sentences.sentence: There is not a scintilla of evidence in this case.
sentences.translation: 在这个个案里，连一丁点证据也没有。
